product_name: Jagwire Comp Mountain XC Brake Pads
long_description: The Jagwire Comp cross-country mountain bike brake pads are high-performance brake pads that keep money in your pocket and offer forceful stopping power. Long-wearing, all-weather compound offers excellent modulation and a good combination of dry-condition stopping power and wet-weather control. Low-profile design with an off-set post. Compatible with V-brake and U-brake systems; ceramic-rim compatible. Set of 2.
short_description: The Jagwire Comp cross-country mountain bike brake pads are high-performance brake pads that keep money in your pocket and offer forceful stopping power.
